LightningComponentBundle.description: This will display all the community assets for a specific record

property.name: recordId
property.label: Record Id
property.description: Record id of that you want to retrieve the assets for

property.name: listTitle
property.label: List Title
property.description: This is the the text that will be displayed as the title

property.name: newButtonLabel
property.label: New Button Label
property.description: This is the text that will display for the button that allows the user to create a new asset

property.name: assetFields
property.label: Asset Fields
property.description: This is a comma separated list of fields to disable on the community asset list.

property.name: showHeaders
property.label: Show Column Headers
property.description: Check this box to show the column headers.

property.name: newPage
property.label: Open Assets In New Tab
property.description: Check this box to open the assets in a new tab.

property.name: customId
property.label: Component Custom Id
property.description: Custom, distinct CSS ID name. Usually remains blank.

property.name: customClass
property.label: Component Custom Class
property.description: Custom CSS class name. Usually remains blank.
